# kernel.txt
tmp4="rpi4"
tmp4v7="rpi4v7"
tmp3="rpi3"
tmp3v7="rpi3v7"
tmp0="rpi0"
def="../defconfig"
pat="../patches"
# do not edit above this line

# kernel
kernel="linux-rpi"
version="5.4.y"
cores=`nproc`

# 0 = active
# 1 = inactive
foundation_defconfig=0
lessfoundation_defconfig=1
menuconfig=1
native=1
crosscompile=0

# user defconfig must be in defconfig directory
custom_defconfig=1
MYCONFIG="nameofyour_defconfig"
